reviews.title: Loved the Marriott in Southfield!!!
reviews.text: I had no idea this hotel existed. I was so happy when my reservation was cancelled at the Embassy Suites. The staff was so friendly. My room was beautiful- I slept great in the comfy bed. The meal, which was steak that I had at the Hotel was one of the best meals I had in a long time. Top it off with a nice glass of wine, it was a great way to relax after a long day on the road.
This hotel is ideal for people traveling on business. The access to high speed internet, the fitness facility and again, the staff was a welcomed change to my usual less than great stays.
reviews.title: Disappointing

reviews.text: Stayed here for a week on business and as most Marriots you know what to expect. The room was clean and pleasant, as was the hotel generally. Would stay again
reviews.title: Good Standard

reviews.text: Had the best stay at the Marriott Southfield. Staff was absolutely incredible. Accomodated our every request...with a smile! Let my 2 yr. old and myself check in at 9 am while my husband tended to his commitments. Even drove us to the local mall in the courtesy van and picked us up when we were through. Very clean, quiet hotel with wonderful beds and linens. Complimentary computer/ business station for using internet and printing documents. Nice pool area with lockers etc. Bar was nice as was restaurant. Marriott is doing somthing very right, especially at this Southfield hotel. The staff is what makes the big difference. They seem happy to assist and are courteous and go out of their way to make their guests happy. Love this hotel!!!!
reviews.title: This Marriott is Awesome!

reviews.text: i booked a room with the romance package this past june. the hotel was great - rooms were clean and all. the hotel even had the package (champagne and strawberries) in my room when i arrived. however, one thing that bothered me during my stay was the staff. first, upon arrival, they refused to give me the second bottle of champagne that was included in my package despite having showed them e-mail confirmations of the package. second, the manager finally came to my room to read the confirmations but made to attempt to apologize for the situation. the cleaning staff could also use some training in what 'do not disturb' means. we had the late check-out option included in our package (4pm checkout) and the cleaning staff must have attempted to come in at least 3 times between 12pm-4pm despite having a 'do not disturb' sign on the door. the hotel was great and the package was great (after i finally got the hotel to give it to me) but the staff definitely could use some work.
reviews.title: good hotel, staff could use some work

reviews.text: Stayed a week at the Southfield Courtyard. Its an older building but redone with all the new Courtyard furniture and bedding. The bedding is a nice improvement over the old stuff and I slept well, I must admit.
reviews.title: Good stay at the Courtyard
